markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Thuvian Unifier](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=80)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 58 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

**Region** Golden Road

</column>

You believe the city-states of Thuvia should be united into one nation under the rule of your home city (most commonly Aspenthar), and you’re willing to do whatever it takes to make it happen.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength
or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) skill, and the [Politics Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Quick Coercion](/Feats.aspx?ID=822) skill feat.
name: Thuvian Unifier

text: Thuvian Unifier Source World Guide pg. 58 2.0 Region Golden Road You believe the city-states of Thuvia should be united into one nation under the rule of your home city (most commonly Aspenthar), and you’re willing to do whatever it takes to make it happen. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Intimidation skill, and the Politics Lore skill. You gain the Quick Coercion skill feat.
